alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 3:10PM MDT until March 17 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with the heaviest accumulations along the valley edges. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The San Luis Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with roads becoming slush and snowpacked at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads may melt off at times during the afternoon and during periods of lighter snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
